Description: Postcard; printed paper; photpgraph showing the second pylon in the Great Temple of Amun at Karnak.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally unused but use as part of a sequence of cards. The message on this particular one is dated 29/5/16, sent from the YMCA No.1 Sidi Bishr and reads: "My dearest darling girlie, Oh I am so awfully cross. While in town this morning I found a Bibby Line mail leaves today & I hadn't written even a p.c. [postcard] to you. You see I have been very busy & didn't think that a mail would leave today after one leaving yesterday. Still I am giving up my rest & writing this now because I am going to hurry up & send a p.c. or two. Thanks very much for your two letters which I received in town this morning - dated May 10 & 16. Can you imagine this dear? A terribly scorching hot day - so hot that one wishes to..."
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Temple of Amun
